text: The Wind in the Willows is a children's book by Scottish author Kenneth Grahame. It was published in 1908. It is about four animals (toad, mole, rat and badger) throughout their adventures in the English countryside. ==References== ==Other websites== * The Wind in the Willows by Kenneth Grahame at Project Gutenberg Category:1908 books Category:British children's books
title: The Wind in the Willows
